name: WhoStoleTheCookieFromTheCookieJar
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: who stole the cookie
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Play the classic children's sing-along game "Who Stole The Cookie From The Cookie Jar" with your old pal Alexa. She'll accuse you, then you'll accuse her. Go back and forth ad nauseam until mom snaps and throws Alexa across the room. Fun for the whole family! 

TECH SUPPORT & FEEDBACK:
support@budgievoice.com

Whole Stole The Cookie is made by Budgie - creators of the hit Alexa skills:

The Pod Bay Doors
...and more!
